MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick, affecting properties in Trainer's Brae and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 8:22AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair a suspected underground cable fault on Trainer's Brae and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9AM on 07 February 2021.
